items.sentence: Tom took one more look at Mary\'s picture and then threw it into the fire.
I usually eat two or three eggs for breakfast at least three times a week.
Tom deposited three thousand dollars in the bank just before closing time.
Tom thinks it would be better not to change dollars into yen at this time.
Tom told me that he thought the dress that Mary was wearing was too short.
Tom finally had to get a restraining order because Mary kept stalking him.
Tom didn\'t know he didn\'t have enough time to do what needed to be done.
The best way to ruin a good cup of coffee is to put cream and sugar in it.
Tom just couldn\'t stop himself from eating the whole bag of potato chips.
Do you think there's any possibility that the embargo will be lifted soon?
